Hello

David Hamilton, the founder of A Fresh Perspective, brings 10+ years experience from an Analytics and Reporting background into the web design and development world. When he's not obsessed with learning new web frameworks, he can often be found hunting Pokemon in the A/R world of Pokemon GO, enjoying a hot cup of Americano coffee or perhaps on a patio enjoying an ice cold craft beer (in the summer, of course).
While we may be a small operation we make up for it with a personal touch you won't get from a larger web studio.
